snippet: The Environmental Protection Agency’s $500 million proposal to clean the Gowanus Canal has worried Brooklyn residents about the effects on the air and a beloved swimming pool.
abstract: Environmental Protection Agency's $500 million plan to clean up Gowanus Canal has run up against protests from local residents; most people want the canal cleared of toxic pollution, but those who live nearby have taken issue with methods proposed by agency that they fear will negatively affect local quality of life.
lead_paragraph: The Environmental Protection Agency’s $500 million proposal to clean the Gowanus Canal has worried Brooklyn residents about the effects on the air and a beloved swimming pool.

headline.seo: E.P.A. Plan to Clean Up Gowanus Canal Meets Local Resistance
headline.main: Neighbors Resist a Plan to Clean a Toxic Canal
headline.print_headline: Neighbors Resist a Plan To Clean a Toxic Canal
